Double Punch/Bumblebee/Injector/Manterror:



Double Punch slammed into a tree, Beeline exploding.  "Slaggin' Maxis." he 
said, firing two missiles at Ultracon's back.

---

Bumblebee yelped as he moved to the left, letting the grenade hit a tree, 
bark and metal cutting into his face.  Raising both stinger missile 
launchers, he pulled the trigger for each three times, six stinger missiles 
heading for Triceradon.

---

Injector yelled as he saw the rock he was behind chip away rapidly.  Crawling 
to the left, he took aim, firing three stinger missiles at Stegotron's 
abdomen.

---

Manterror looked up, seeing the other Predacons fighting.  Raising an arm, 
keeping an eye on Ramulus, he fired an ion disk at Stegotron's left arm.
